newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - S. Barney starts two oil refiners.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - S. Barney starts two oil refiners.

text.p: -- Smith Barney analyst James Falvey said he started Tosco Corp and Tesoro Petroleum Corp with outperform ratings.
-- The analyst set a 12- to 18-month target price of $105 on Tosco and $16 on Tesoro.
-- Falvey estimated Tosco would earn $3.60 per share in 1996, $5.40 per share for 1997 and $6.60 per share for 1998.
-- He said he expected Tesoro to earn $1.25 per share in 1996, $1.10 per share in 1997 and $1.40 per share in 1998.
